Each of these skins may feature: a voiceover filter; additional quotes and/or interactions. In all other cases, skins use the base skin's audio or version of the audio. Some voicelines may also be disabled while using alternate skins.

Joke[]

Irelia plays her blades like a piano, with the last one literally falling flat on the ground.
  • ▶️   ▶️   ▶️   "(Grunt of anger) Hang on...!"
  • ▶️   ▶️   ▶️   "(Clears throat) Wai-wai- uh, wait..."
  • ▶️   ▶️   ▶️   "Wait, wait, wait, wait, no... (clears throat)"
  • ▶️   ▶️   ▶️   "Wait, wait, wait, wait..."
Joke Response
  • ▶️   ▶️   ▶️   "Contrary to what you've heard, I have a great sense of humor."

Trivia[]

Irelia, the Will of the Blades
  • ▶️  "My blade is not only precise, but totally gnarly." goes hand-in-hand with Irelia riding her blade like a surfboard during her joke ('gnarly' is surfer slang for 'cool').
  • Her French localization jokes reference Brice de Nice.
Irelia, the Blade Dancer
  • ▶️   ▶️   "Cut them down." is the only quote preserved after the rework.
Frostblade Irelia
  • ▶️  "The cold? Eh, it never bothered me." references the lyrics "The cold never bothered me anyway." in Let It Go (Disney song).
